mapper.select: select count(1) as totalcnt from vtuser where (uname like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or uid like '%'||#{searchval}||'%')

select a.*, CHAR (a.cre_dt) as char_cre_dt from vtuser a where (uname like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or uid like '%'||#{searchval}||'%') order by viewid desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as totalcnt from vtqna a where del_yn !='Y'
AND answer !=''
AND answer =''
and (title like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or question like '%'||#{searchval}||'%')

select a.*, b.uname, CHAR (a.cre_dt) as char_cre_dt, char(a.upd_dt) as char_upd_dt from vtqna a , vtuser b where del_yn !='Y'
AND answer !=''
AND answer =''
and a.cre_id = b.viewid and (title like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or question like '%'||#{searchval}||'%') order by qnaid desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY

select a.vconnid ,a.vname from vtconnection a , VTDATABASE_MANAGER_ROLE b where a.vconnid = b.vconnid
AND 1=1
and b.viewid = #{uid}
and (a.vname like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or a.vurl like '%'||#{searchval}||'%') order by a.vconnid desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${rows} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as totalcnt from vtconnection a , VTDATABASE_MANAGER_ROLE b where a.vconnid = b.vconnid
AND 1=1
and b.viewid = #{uid}
and (a.vname like '%'||#{searchval}||'%' or a.vurl like '%'||#{searchval}||'%')
select * from vtuser a left outer join vtdatabase_user_role b on a.viewid = b.viewid and b.vconnid = #{vconnid} where (b.vconnid = #{vconnid} or b.vconnid is null )

select date(max(start_time)) VIEW_DATE, CASE WHEN s_mm >= 10 then cast(s_mm AS CHAR(2)) else '0'||CAST (s_mm AS CHAR(1)) END||'-'||CAST(CAST (s_dd AS CHAR(2)) AS VARCHAR(2)) X_COL , count(1) as Y_COL from VTSQL_LOG a where vconnid=#{vconnid} and start_time between #{s_date} and #{e_date} group by s_mm , s_dd order by s_mm, s_dd
